constituent: embrace, finger, fingers, wrap, bound up, snake, self
koohiiStory1: When embracing someone, wrap your fingers around her butt for added effect. You may think of "bound with snakes" as a description of the fingers slithering around the buttocks, if you want a particularly graphic image.
koohiiStory2: Here, I´m picturing that scene from ET (the extra terrestrial), where ET hugs Elliot before leaving. You see that EMBRACE is ET´s long FINGERS that WRAP around Elliot.
myStory: ôm. tay bao quanh là ôm
readingExamples: 抱く (いだ.く), 抱える (かか.える), 抱く (だ.く)
words: embrace, hug, harbour, entertain, sleep with
hold or carry under or in the arms
